response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item offers unparalleled benefits and features that are sure to meet and surpass your needs. We believe its true value exceeds $15,000, but for the sake of negotiation, I am willing to extend an exclusive offer to you. My proposal is to make this remarkable product yours for $18,000. I trust this price reflects not only the quality and craftsmanship but also provides you with a significant value. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 18000}
